text: Manager is extremely rude and is not willing to work with you on your order. She also refuses to customize a pzone order by adding breadstick seasoning on top because there isn't an option online for it so they can't do it because she â€¦More

name: Ben
text: They don't have the gluten free crust, were out of wings, and the high pseudo-sports bar seating and the rock-hard chairs make it an uncomfortable place to eat. It used to be much better. Oh well. On the plus side, the pizza is standard â€¦More

name: Stranger Danger
text: Nobody to seat people, was told to just find a seat. Sat without menus or drink order taken for quite some time. Order was taken by the waitress who offered no specials. Someone from the kitchen brought out our pizza. Nobody checked on us â€¦More

text: I will never eat at this Pizza Hut again. Every time for the past 3 visits they have gotten our order completely wrong and still tried charging us for it. Wait staff is almost impossible to find to get refills of drink, check, or to go â€¦More

name: Joshua Morris
text: Crappy deepdish and poor service. I know its pizza hut, but there deepdish is always oily and tastes of old oil. Salad bar is decent. Got our food and drinks then were not offered refills even when we were brought our ticket. Have been to this location a few times and hasn't gotten better.

name: Kevin James
text: Here it is. This PH has, for many years, made dumb as weird pizzas for the buffet because the staff likes them and public be damned. IF there is a pizza on the buffet, it's old AF and better used as a doorstop.  When I bring my family here â€¦More
